name: Apothecary (huf0001)
description:
Apothecary: you have herbs you don't know what they do, and patients that are sick. Try some herbs on them and experiment and see what works, but try not to kill them or let them die of their sicknesses.

Developed for Ludum Dare 43 by Emily, Liam, Sam (me) and Burju. If you could go to the Ludum Dare page, and rate it and provide feedback, that'd be awesome.

Books: click on them to open them, click a page to turn the page, and click outside the book to close it. Patient files: click on one to open it, click herbs to prescribe them (you can add as many of each as you like; you can't undo a prescription), and click the file again to close it. Click finished when you’re done prescribing herbs and see how you did. Then you can close that book and have another go with herb uses you discovered updated in the herb book.
